title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day

title: The Xbox 360 Vs PS3 Console War Was A Race To 10 Million Sales, Ex-Xbox Exec Says
description: The era of console wars seems to be nearing its end, but one of its key players, Peter Moore, who led the charge during the launch of the Xbox 360, is sharing his memories of his time on the gaming frontlines. When it came to pitting the Xbox 360 against the PlayStation 3, Moore says 10 million was the magic number--"You've got this flywheel effect ... of [if] your mate in the school yard's got one, you better get one." Speaking to Eurogamer, Moore explained that getting the Xbox 360 into the market ahead of the PS3 was key to its strong performance, saying that the first 10 million sales were vital. "I think it was really important to get it out first," Moore said. "Get going, get momentum, and aim for that 10 million installed base that I felt that would give us an amazing advantage over whatever Sony could do to catch up." He explained that having the 10 million install base creates a network effect where a sense of social pressure could drive sales--"All of a sudden you're out of place and you're on the outside if you're not coming to school, or going to class in college the next day, or even coming to work, and saying what a night we had playing Halo, or whatever game it happened to be." Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Ubisoft Posts Strong First-Half Growth And Teases Major Creative Shake-Up Coming In 2026
description: After a short delay, Ubisoft has posted its first-half earnings figures for 2025-2026. The company says that its Q2 net bookings exceeded expectations and its deal with Tencent to invest $1.2 billion in Vantage Studios--a new subsidiary focused on its three main franchises--is expected to close within a few days. Ubisoft says that its Q2 net bookings were up 39% year-on-year, driven by stronger-than-expected performance across its games catalogue and TV projects. The company had initially predicted that it would reach $520 million for its quarterly books, but this figure increased to $566.7 million. "Our portfolio showed contrasting dynamics this quarter, with softer trends for Rainbow Six Siege, reflecting a phase of evolution for the game in an intense FPS environment, offset by strong performances across the rest of the catalog. The Assassin’s Creed franchise exceeded our expectations, confirming its positive momentum and ability to engage players over time. The Division 2 also continued to perform strongly, benefiting from the momentum of the Battle for Brooklyn DLC," Ubisoft Yves Guillemot said in a press release. Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Death Stranding 2 Collector's Edition & DualSense Get Limited-Time Holiday Discounts
description: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach Collector's Edition $130 (was $230) See at PS Direct Death Stranding 2: On the Beach Standard Edition $50 (was $70) See at Amazon See at PS Direct See at Walmart Death Stranding 2: On the Beach DualSense Controller $65 (was $85) See at PS Direct Several of the biggest PS5 games are on sale for Black Friday, with Death Stranding 2: On the Beach being one of the big highlights. Fans can save $100 on the Death Stranding 2 Collector’s Edition, which is down to $130 (was $100) has also gotten a big price cut and is on sale for $130, down from $230. This bundle gets you the full game, a selection of bonus digital content, and several physical collectibles including figures of Magellan Man and Dollman, a letter from game director Hideo Kojima, and more. If that's too expensive, you can also grab the physical Death Stranding 2 standard edition for just $50 (was $70). In addition to these game deals, the Death Stranding 2 Special Edition DualSense PS5 controller is also discounted to $65 (was $85). Death Stranding 2: On the Beach Collector's Edition $130 (was $230) The Collector’s Edition for Death Stranding 2: On the Beach features a selection of digital and physical items. It comes with a digital download code for Death Stranding 2, a 15-inch statue of Magellan Man inside the collector’s box, a three-inch Dollman figurine on a keychain loop, art cards, and a letter with a message from Hideo Kojima. The digital extras include early in-game unlocks for weapons, equipment, and cosmetics. See at PS Direct Death Stranding 2: On the Beach Standard Edition $50 (was $70) The standard edition of Death Stranding 2 doesn't include any extras, but you at least get the full game on the physical disc. This Black Friday discount drops the game to $50 (was $70) at Amazon, PlayStation Direct, and Walmart. See at Amazon See at PS Direct See at Walmart Death Stranding 2: On the Beach DualSense Controller $65 (was $85) The Death Stranding 2 DualSense controller is also on sale, and this was designed in partnership with Kojima Productions. It has a sleek black finish and insignia based on the fictional Drawbridge company that appears in the sequel, orange accents, and the “Death Stranding 2” logo on the back. On the controller touchpad you’ll find the motto of Drawbridge: "Both stick and rope, to protect and connect. Together, from tomorrow." See at PS Direct A direct sequel to 2019’s Death Stranding, Death Stranding 2: On the Beach continues the story of Sam Porter Bridges as he works to reunite the scattered cities of Earth following a cataclysmic event that left humanity on the edge of extinction. Directed by Hideo Kojima, the game also features a cinematic presentation, with several characters modeled on and voiced by Hollywood celebrities, including Norman Reedus, Guillermo del Toro, and Elle Fanning. If you're looking to fill out your PS5 collections, you'll want to check out the many other PlayStation Black Friday deals available now. You can grab big discounts on standard editions of PS5 exclusives like Astro Bot, God of War Ragnarok, and Gran Turismo 7, or pick up Collector's Editions of Marvel's Spider-Man 2, Horizon Forbidden West, and Ghost of Yotei, all of which are at least $100 off. You'll also find deals on limited edition DualSense controllers based on many of these games, including Astro Bot, God of War Ragnarok, and Ghost of Yotei. We've collected some of our favorite PlayStation Black Friday deals in the list below. Once you've checked those out, give GameSpot's Black Friday Deals Hub a look to see even more holiday discounts on everything from video games and Blu-rays to Legos, figures, and beyond. title: Bring Democracy To The Alien Hordes With This Helldivers 2 PS5 Black Friday Deal
description: Helldivers 2 $30 (was $40) See at Amazon See at PS Direct See at Walmart One of the biggest recent hits on PS5 has been Helldivers 2, a game best described as an online, PvE multiplayer third-person shooter with a satircal tone that melds Starship Troopers with Warhammer 40,000. If you haven't yet enlisted in Super Earth's war machine, you can finally join the fight with this Black Friday deal on the game, as it's down to $30 (was $40) for the sales event. This is a great excuse to check out the multiplayer shooter if you've been interested--and might be a good opportunity to convince a few friends to pick up the game and group up, too. This limited-time deal is available at Amazon, PlayStation Direct, and Walmart. Helldivers 2 $30 (was $40) Helldivers 2 has a simple but engaging premise. As one of Super Earth's defenders, it's up to you to bring the concept of Managed Democracy to worlds infested with vile alien species and marauding machines. How do you spread the good word? With guns, bombing runs, and well-placed tactical nuclear strikes deep in the heart of enemy territory. An always-online game, Helldivers 2 can be played solo or with fellow soldiers, and it receives constant updates that add new weapons to your arsenal and shiny cosmetics to collect. See at Amazon See at PS Direct See at Walmart Helldivers 2 sets itself apart in the live-service game genre by adopting a novel spin on in-game currencies. While you'll regularly earn rewards from successful missions and for taking part in community events, the premium in-game currency can also be earned simply by playing the game. While it does take longer than simply swiping your credit card and buying the resources, you can get everything that Helldivers 2 has to offer if you don't mind grinding away for it. Luckily, the game's battle passes don't expire, and you can unlock what you want from it when you want it, provided that you have enough points saved up. While it's multiplayer-only, the game's playerbase is large and active, and it's still easy to find others to play with, even over a year later. Even better, developer Arrowhead doesn't plan to stop supporting the title anytime soon, as it envisions it as a forever game like the legendary Runescape, so it appears Helldivers 2 will be around for quite a while. Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Gran Turismo 7 Gets Big Black Friday Discount
description: Gran Turismo 7 $30 (was $70) See at Amazon See at PS Direct See at Walmart Gran Turismo has been PlayStation's premiere racing game franchise for decades, and if you haven't experienced it yet, you can get a Black Friday deal on Gran Turismo 7. Normally $70, you can get behind the wheel of the game for just $30 and burn some digital rubber in photorealistic races. Gran Turismo 7 $30 (was $70) One of the groundbreaking racing game franchises that emerged in the '90s, Gran Turismo focused on making the experience as realistic--and as good-looking--as possible. Gran Turismo 7 builds on that rich legacy, presenting a selection of finely tuned vehicles, circuits spread across the globe, and a layer of realism that will make you feel like you really are driving a vehicle that costs an obscene amount of cash in the real world. See at Amazon See at PS Direct See at Walmart While the standard edition of the Gran Turismo 7 only includes the base game, now is a good time to pick it up, as a major update called Spec III will be added to the game in December. This will add two new tracks, eight new cars, a new circuit experience, and new features like the data logger to the game. If you want to go all in on the immersion, you can pick up a PlayStation VR2 headset to create a dynamic gameplay experience. The VR headset and controllers are on sale for $300 (was $500) and it also includes the Horizon spin-off bundle Call of the Mountain. PlayStation VR2Be sure to check out the many other discounts available in PlayStation's Black Friday sale. Physical edition games like find Astro Bot, Demon's Souls, and God of War Ragnarok are all on sale, as are several collector's edition games like Ghost of Yotei, limited-edition DualSense controllers, and even PS5 console bundles. title: Grab The Last Of Us Part 1 And 2 For Cheap Thanks To Black Friday
description: The Last OF Us Part 1 $30 (was $70) See at Amazon See at PS Direct See at Walmart See at Best Buy The Last OF Us Part 2 Remastered $30 (was $50) See at Amazon See at PS Direct See at Walmart See at Best Buy The Last of Us has become one of the biggest franchises on PlayStation, and if you haven't checked it out yet, you can get the PS5 versions of The Last of Us Part 1 and The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered are on sale for $30 each during Black Friday. The Last of Us Part 1 normally costs $70 and The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered costs $50 at full price, meaning you're saving a total of $60 if you pick up both while they're on sale. The Last OF Us Part 1 $30 (was $70) The Last of Us Part 1 is a remake of the classic PS3 game that substantially updates its visuals while preserving its gameplay and story. While several quality-of-life features were introduced in this version, the core experience has been retained and is still an effective game that mixes action, exploration, and survival-horror themes together. In addition to the main campaign, this version of the game also includes the Left Behind prequel chapter, new weapons, upgrades, visual filters, and a Speedrun Mode. See at Amazon See at PS Direct See at Walmart The Last OF Us Part 2 Remastered $30 (was $50) The Last of Us Part 2 continues the story that began in the first game, and its PS5 edition is also a noticeable upgrade when compared to the original PS4 release. Graphical improvements and improved loading times on PS5 make for welcome improvements, and the game also features behind-the-scenes commentary from developers at Naughty Dog to show how several scenes were created, unlockable visual filters and cheat codes, Lost Levels that let you explore early-development versions of three levels not seen in the original game, and the fan-favorite Guitar Free Play mode for when you want to strum a few chords. The other big addition was No Return, a roguelike survival mode that tests your skills against scavengers, bandits, and infected people in across a series of levels. The mode has since received several updates since it was first introduced, and it even includes an unlockable cosmetic inspired by Naughty Dog's next game, Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet. See at Amazon See at PS Direct See at Walmart If you've never played it, The Last of Us is set in a post-apocalyptic future, where society has collapsed after a mutated strain of the Cordyceps fungus has infected and turned most of the populace into rabid monsters. The first game explored themes of loss and redemption as protagonists Joel and Ellie trekked across the remains of the US, while the sequel is a brutal tale of revenge. Both games are among the most critically acclaimed titles on the PS5, thanks to their harrowing post-apocalyptic stories, which have been adapted into the ongoing The Last of Us TV series on HBO. PS5 fans have plenty of other PlayStation Black Friday deals to take advantage of, including discounts on games, collector's editions, controllers, and more. You can even grab a PS5 Pro or PS5 Slim at decent discounts if you're looking to dive into the console's library for the first time. Browse a selection of the best PS5 Black Friday deals below, or head over to GameSpot's Black Friday Deals Hub to see the latest discounts on video games and other categories like Blu-ray, Legos, collectibles, and more. Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales - Ultimate Edition $40 (was $70) Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales - Ultimate Edition includes both the PS5 remaster of Marvel's Spider-Man and the standalone sequel, Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales, making this the definitive way to experience the first Marvel's Spider-Man game on PS5. The Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales - Ultimate Edition Black Friday deal drops the game to $40 (was $70) at Amazon, PlayStation Direct, and Walmart. Marvel's Spider-Man originally released for PS4, but Insomniac gave it a substantial visual upgrade for PS5, and this version includes all three of the post-launch City That Never Sleeps story expansions. The second game in the collection,Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales, is a standalone spin-off that launched alongside the PS5. As the title implies, players control Miles Morales this time around. While it's a shorter experience that sticks to the core gameplay established in Insomniac's first Spider-Man game, it also shakes things up by introducing new powers to the mix that are exclusive to Miles, allowing players to experiment with his optical camouflage and bio-electric abilities in battle. See at Amazon See at PlayStation Direct See at Walmart Marvel's Spider-Man 2 $30 (was $70) Marvel's Spider-Man 2 includes the full base game on PS5. It's on sale for $40 (was $70) at Amazon, PlayStation Direct, and Walmart. The sequel introduces the sinister Venom symbiote and further develops the storylines from the first game, including Spider-Man's fragile relationship with his best friend Harry Osborn and Miles' coming to terms with a devastating loss. Compared to the first game, Marvel's Spider-Man 2 fleshes out the gameplay with the ability to swap between Peter Parker and Miles Morales, both of whom have a suite of new powers to try out. See at Amazon See at PlayStation Direct See at Walmart Marvel's Spider-Man 2 Collector's Edition $130 (was $230) You can also save $100 on the Marvel's Spider-Man 2 Collector's Edition exclusively through PlayStation Direct. This includes a digital download code for the PS5 game, a 19-inch statue of Venom alongside Peter and Miles, a steelbook case, and 10 bonus suits--five for Peter, five for Miles. See at PlayStation Direct All three games have scored highly at GameSpot, with Marvel's Spider-Man earning a 9 for its cinematic presentation and exciting gameplay, Miles Morales scored a 7, and Marvel's Spider-Man 2 walked away with an 8 for its emotional story while sticking to a winning gameplay formula. These official Black Friday PlayStation deals are the perfect chance to catch up on the web-slinging saga--but they're far from the only PS5 games discounted right now. You can score deals on plenty of other PS5 titles, including 2024's The Game Awards winner for Game of the Year, Astro Bot, for $40 (was $60), as well as notable launch titles like Demon's Souls for $30 (was $70), and recent releases like Death Stranding 2 for $50 (was $70). Check out even more PS5 Black Friday deals below. And don't forget to keep an eye on GameSpot's Black Friday Deals Hub throughout the month to see the latest holiday shopping discounts. Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: PS5-Exclusive Soulslike Stellar Blade Is Just $40
description: Stellar Blade $40 (was $70) See at Amazon See at PS Direct See at Walmart See at Best Buy PlayStation's Black Friday 2025 sales have kicked off, and if you're looking to grow your PS5 library, then you'll want to check out this deal on Stellar Blade. Shift Up's action-RPG is on sale for $40, a big cut from its usual price of $70. The discount is available at Amazon, PlayStation Direct, Walmart, and Best Buy. Stellar Blade $40 (was $70) The Stellar Blade standard edition includes the full base game. Set in a future where humanity has been driven from Earth by the emergence of the Naytibas--hyper-aggressive monsters that can evolve into powerful forms and infect technology--Stellar Blade puts you in control of Eve, the last survivor of the 7th Airborne Squad, which was decimated before their operation could properly begin. Eve sets out to destroy the Elder Naytibas and reclaim Earth, while also carving a path forward through the Alpha Naytibas and their minions. Stellar Blade features many elements that are similar to the Souls-like genre--from challenging boss fights to campsites that respawn monsters when you rest at them--but it also merges those mechanics with more traditional action game ideas, allowing you to increase Eve's power and skillset steadily along the way. Since launch, Stellar Blade has received numerous updates. Eve's wardrobe has been expanded with several new outfits, and paid DLC expansions have seen the crossovers with Nier: Automata and Goddess of Victory: Nikke. See at Amazon See at PS Direct See at Walmart If you're interested in checking out PlayStation's other Black Friday deals, be sure to check out the lists below. We've compiled a selection of our favorite deals--including discounts on PS5 console exclusives like Astro Bot, God of War Ragnarok, and Helldivers 2; big price cuts to Collector's Editions for Horizon Forbidden West, Death Stranding 2, and Marvel's Spider-Man 2; and price cuts for PS5 consoles, controllers, accessories, and more. And don't forget to check out GameSpot's Black Friday Deals Hub for even more holiday shopping sales beyond these PlayStation discounts.
